summary: A guy is about to become the millionth citizen to buy a car in Rome. Frightened, he decides to remain pedestrian, and recalls several stories, with new car owners as protagonists.
cast: Nino Manfredi|Ugo Tognazzi|Franca Valeri|Walter Chiari|José Luis López Vázquez|Mercedes Alonso|Gianni Agus|Dolores Palumbo|Luigi Pavese|Gina Rovere|Luigi Bonos|Paola Del Bosco|Mario Brega|Loredana Nusciak|Peppino De Martino|Franco Giacobini|Mario Pisu|Marcella Rovena|Alberto Bonucci|Mac Ronay|Aroldo Tieri|Franca Tamantini|Franco Franchi|Ciccio Ingrassia|David Areu|Carlos Bajardo|Yolanda Bengoa|Xan das Bolas|Charly Bravo|José Calderón|Perla Cristal|Consalvo Dell'Arti|Ángela Escribano|George Martin|Carlos Muñoz|Ernesto Palazón|Mimmo Poli|Mayra Rey|Alfonso Rojas|Jovita Vicuña
title: Los motorizados
